text: To jyare inkari'o sathe tamari athadamana thaya to gala para vara karo, jyare te'one barabara kacadi nakho to have barabara thosa bandhi kedi banavi lo, (pachi adhikara che) ke cahe upakara kari chodi do athava dandani rakama la'ilo. Jyam sudhi te'o potana sastra muki na de, a ja adesa che ane jo allaha icche to (pote ja) te'othi badalo la'i le, parantu (teni iccha e che) ke tamara manthi eka ni kasoti bijathi la'i le, je loko allahana margamam sahida kari devamam ave che, allaha te'ona karmo kadapi nahi vedaphe
